global_caption: a scene featuring a man wearing a white shirt, beige pants, and black shoes, holding a map in his right hand and wearing sunglasses, a woman wearing a white shirt with pink flower patterns, short jeans, and a pair of sandals, holding a coffee in her left hand and a grey luggage in her right hand, a man wearing a green shirt, beige shorts, and black shoes, with short black hair and wearing a watch on his left wrist, a woman wearing a long light-blue dress and a pair of sandals, holding a beige hat in her left hand and a black camera in her right hand, and a city with yellow and white colored antique buildings in the back.
